title: CELEST: Federated Learning for Globally Coordinated Threat Detection. (arXiv:2205.11459v3 [cs.CR] UPDATED)
abstract: The cyber-threat landscape has evolved tremendously in recent years, with new threat variants emerging daily, and large-scale coordinated campaigns becoming more prevalent. CELEST leverages federated learning in order to collaboratively train a global model across multiple clients who keep their data locally, thus providing increased privacy and confidentiality assurances. Through a novel active learning component integrated with the federated learning technique, our system continuously discovers and learns the behavior of new, evolving, and globally-coordinated cyber threats. en_tdlr: CELEST is a federated machine learning framework for global threat detection over HTTP, leveraging federated learning and a novel active learning component to collaboratively train a global model and continuously learn new globally-coordinated cyber threats, providing increased privacy and confidentiality assurances, and exposing attacks that are largely invisible to individual organizations.
